posts.name: brrrrr
posts.cooked:
Hello,
I would like to inlcude the webography of a document that mentions an academic example but does not qualify to a standard bibliographic citation (no information about authors as it was made in the name of an enterprise to help people use its technology).
Many thanks in advance
posts.raw:
Hello,
I would like to inlcude the webography of a document that mentions an academic example but does not qualify to a standard bibliographic citation (no information about authors as it was made in the name of an enterprise to help people use its technology).
Many thanks in advance

posts.name: Pascal Quach
posts.cooked:
Hello @Enjoyer_101,

If I understand well, you want to cite web content that were authored by corporate entities. It would help if you give us more details, but as far as I know, there is no issue with doing that.

Your bibfile can be written by hand, e.g., for a website reference. The author is not a physical person, it is quoted verbatim using {{ ... }}.

@online{AnticipatoryActionOCHA_jun_2024,
  title = {Anticipatory Action},
  author = {{United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs}},
  date = {2024-06-25},
  url = {https://www.unocha.org/anticipatory-action},
  urldate = {2024-07-08},
  abstract = {Every year, millions of people face the reality of},
  langid = {english}
}
posts.raw:
Hello @Enjoyer_101,

If I understand well, you want to cite web content that were authored by corporate entities. It would help if you give us more details, but as far as I know, there is no issue with doing that.

Your bibfile can be written by hand, e.g., for a website reference. The author is not a physical person, it is quoted verbatim using `{{ ... }}`.

```bib
@online{AnticipatoryActionOCHA_jun_2024,
  title = {Anticipatory Action},
  author = {{United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs}},
  date = {2024-06-25},
  url = {https://www.unocha.org/anticipatory-action},
  urldate = {2024-07-08},
  abstract = {Every year, millions of people face the reality of},
  langid = {english}
}
```
